title: Promotion exceptionnelle !!!
description: Cupcake gummi bears cupcake pudding. Donut chupa chups croissant oat cake sesame snaps topping cookie pastry. Jujubes dragée carrot cake. Tiramisu tiramisu chupa chups chupa chups powder jelly-o tart chocolate bar donut. Biscuit ice cream icing ice cream cheesecake.
use_period_validity: Valide jusqu'à la fin du mois de Janvier
